channel.title: Reseting the harsh
channel.description:
RuneScape can sometimes be daughnting say for instances, if you level 1-5 defence and your a pure by accident or even hackag3. Fagex need to fix this.
I think there should be a Quest, (Long and Hard), and once completed you get the ability to choose a stat you can reset any time you want. However there's a twist, your level [b]must[/b] be below 10 to reset and you [b]must[/b] pay a minium of 500k.
What do you think of this?
Please vote via reply and put your RuneScape username along with it, we can make this get big!

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

xxlukexx:

although people rant about leveling defense, i doubt they will pay 500k to get reset… IDK why, i just feel it.

Lol, I would pay 1m to get my defence reset to 1 from 7 if I wanted to.

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:33, topic:376596”]Someone could have seen your password and if you didn’t know you were downloading a virus.
And there are PassWordHacking programs out there.[/quote]

You have control over whether people ‘see your password’ don’t you? If you aren’t 100% positive that what you are downloading isn’t a virus, then you don’t run it until you scan it first. You can run an anti-virus, or you can use one of the numerous scanning utilities out there on the web.

There are no ‘password hacking programs’ out there. The only possible way for one to work for something like runescape is to brute-force your password, by just guessing numbers and letters. If you have a decent password (one not in the dictionary) then they will never guess it.

Again, if you ‘get hacked’ it is 100% your fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

X Entinity X:

Ok, thanks for the input of your opinion, however, it’s not technically your fault if you get hacked is it?

It is absolutely your fault if you get ‘hacked’. You used an easy-to-guess password, gave it to someone, installed a virus on your computer, or typed it into another website.

Read full topic

item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

I know what you’re thinking, it’s more Rsps’y, however they could make it more realistic by adding a cool quest or mini-game to go with it.

@Edit- it doesn’t have to be 500k, it could be 250k, but pures passionate about their account’s and being the best of their ability possible would pay 500k.

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

Mr Mopar X:

I don’t support. Why would I pay to reset my skill level, let alone do a long quest? Besides, all my levels are over 75.

Oh my god retardation?, I said if someone needed it (if they’re a pure not a main) and I don’t care what levels you have, I was asking for what you thought of the idea. Some people would pay for this as it’s not much money.

Edit- buddy I didn’t ask what stats you had and if you didn’t like it did I? so why post un-useful shit?

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:21, topic:376596”][quote author=.::Ix Miir xI::. link=topic=472522.msg3457771#msg3457771 date=1294184277]
i know what the point your getting at, but people would take advantage, such as getting a skill up(such as attack) and then get 99 str and then reset there attack so they become a str pure by taking an easier and faster road then getting 99 str with 1 attack, which would take ages.
[/quote]

That is pointless. Who would want to reset a 99 on runescape for another 99?
Also, that would take long as fuck to get 99 attack because your hitting so low because of your strengh.[/quote]

/Facepalm, I said the skill had to be 10 or below to reset, it can’t be 11 or higher.

Read full topic

your level must be below 10 to reset

item.title: Reseting the harsh
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I don’t agree with how difficult it is. There should be something like “You bring (items) to (witch) and pay her (certain amount of money) and she casts a spell to reset it.” because that seems more realistic, rather than going through hell just to do something as simple as bringing down a skill. Plus this one makes sense, because you’re technically “unlearning”.

Read full topic
